name: Shinigami (Matthew Young)
description:
Hack and Slash your way through this 2D Action-Platformer

Gamepad Support • 15 min playtime

Shinigami is a 2D Action-Platformer, developed by a group of students in an intro to game design course at the University of Utah, in 2016

The game has gamepad support, and an in-game tutorial that teaches you the various mechanics of ledge grabbing, using your dash to dodge hazards, attacking in combos, and using your EP for a special attack

The game has puzzles, platforming challenges, and 4 enemy types to face

The player manages stamina and energy points, as well as growing increasingly stronger through a leveling system

The game itself consists of one tutorial section, one large main level, and an end game testing ground

Can you escape? CREDITS  Programming - Tsundown  •  Background & Enemy Art - Tsundown  •  Main Character Art - Zelltribal & Tsundown   Music - Detlef S  •  Sound Design - Tsundown
